contents:
没想到域名是阿里云注册的，山东的兄弟\\姐妹


下面用nmap扫描了一下操作系统以及开放的端口，结果如下：

Nmap scan report for pincong.net
Host is up (0.057s latency).
Not shown: 983 closed ports
PORT      STATE    SERVICE
21/tcp    open    ftp
25/tcp    filtered smtp
42/tcp    filtered nameserver
80/tcp    open    http
135/tcp  filtered msrpc
139/tcp  filtered netbios-ssn
445/tcp  filtered microsoft-ds
593/tcp  filtered http-rpc-epmap
1434/tcp  filtered ms-sql-m
3306/tcp  open    mysql
4444/tcp  filtered krb524
6123/tcp  filtered backup-express
49152/tcp open    unknown
49153/tcp open    unknown
49154/tcp open    unknown
49155/tcp open    unknown
49157/tcp open    unknown
Aggressive OS guesses: Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 (99%), Microsoft Windows 7 SP1 (99%), Microsoft Windows 7 or Windows Server 2008 R2 (99%), Microsoft Windows Server 2008 or 2008 Beta 3 (99%), Microsoft Windows 7 SP1 or Windows Server 2008 SP2 or 2008 R2 SP1 (99%), Microsoft Windows Vista SP0 or SP1, Windows Server 2008 SP1, or Windows 7 (99%), Microsoft Windows Vista SP2 (99%), Microsoft Windows Vista SP2, Windows 7 SP1, or Windows Server 2008 (99%), Microsoft Windows Server 2008 (98%), Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 or Windows 8 (98%)
No exact OS matches for host (test conditions non-ideal).
Network Distance: 17 hops

OS detection performed. Please report any incorrect results at https://nmap.org/submit/ .
Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 59.31 seconds

用的是windows服务器，熟悉党国的可以来分析一下，我觉得是个人弄的，技术太垃圾，还在阿里云注册域名，注意，阿里云（北京）是实名的。软件挺老的，可以试试sql injection黑一下。
